name: OpenWeChatSDK
prepare_command:
# 创建Base Module
rm -rf Modules
mkdir Modules
touch Modules/module.modulemap
cat <<-EOF > Modules/module.modulemap
framework module OpenWeChatSDK {
  umbrella header "WechatAuthSDK.h"
  umbrella header "WXApi.h"
  umbrella header "WXApiObject.h"
  export *
  link "c++"
  link "z"
  link "sqlite3.0"
}
EOF
